title: Calories in Sugar Free Pudding
meta_description: Discover calories in sugar free pudding per serving, including carbs, protein, fat, and nutrition facts for prepared instant varieties.
assumptions: Instant sugar-free pudding mix (e.g., vanilla), prepared with 2% milk; 1 serving = 1/2 cup (113 g) prepared.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, flavor, milk type used, and preparation; artificial sweeteners may affect taste but not calories significantly. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One serving of prepared sugar free pudding has about 60 kcal and 9 g carbs.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Prepared with whole milk instead of 2%
Add 1 tbsp whipped topping per serving

faqs.q: How many calories in one serving of sugar free pudding?
faqs.a: About 60 kcal for a 1/2 cup serving prepared with 2% milk.

faqs.q: Does sugar free pudding have carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, around 9 g carbs per serving from milk and thickeners, but 0 g sugars.

faqs.q: What's the protein in sugar free pudding?
faqs.a: Typically 2 g protein per serving, mainly from the milk used.

faqs.q: Is sugar free pudding low fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 1.5 g total fat and 1 g saturated fat per serving.

faqs.q: How does milk type affect calories in sugar free pudding?
faqs.a: Whole milk adds ~20 kcal per serving vs. 2% milk; skim reduces by ~10 kcal.
